# DAB Package
Autor : Hockwood

## Langage
- JS : 100% (1 file)

## Functions
- Coupures(Object: params)

params =
- amount: int
- devise: string

!!! devises authorized : "€", "$", "£" !!!

Distributes the amount in bills and coins of the chosen currency.
